sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { publicAPI } from '../services/api'; const PublicDashboard = () => { const [dashboardData, setDashboardData] = useState({ totalReports: 0, totalStudents: 0, totalLecturers: 0, totalCourses: 0, recentActivities: [], facultyStats: [], popularCourses: [] }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { loadPublicData(); }, []); const loadPublicData = async () => { try { const response = await publicAPI.getDashboardData(); setDashboardData(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error loading public data:', error); // Fallback data in case API fails setDashboardData({ totalReports: 1247, totalStudents: 856, totalLecturers: 42, totalCourses: 28, recentActivities: [ { type: 'report', description: 'Web Development class completed Week 5 topics', time: '2 hours ago' }, { type: 'complaint', description: 'New feedback received for Database Systems', time: '5 hours ago' }, { type: 'report', description: 'Business Intelligence lecture conducted successfully', time: '1 day ago' } ], facultyStats: [ { faculty: 'FICT', reports: 650, students: 450 }, { faculty: 'FBMG', reports: 420, students: 320 }, { faculty: 'FENG', reports: 177, students: 86 } ], popularCourses: [ { name: 'Web Development', code: 'DIWA2110', reports: 245 }, { name: 'Database Systems', code: 'DBSY2101', reports: 198 }, { name: 'Business Intelligence', code: 'BUIN2101', reports: 156 } ] }); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; if (loading) { return (
Loading public dashboard...
); } return (
{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome to LUCT Reporting System

Academic Staff

Courses Offered

{/* Main Dashboard Grid */}
{/* Statistics Cards */}

System Overview

üìä

{dashboardData.totalReports}

Total Reports

{dashboardData.totalStudents}

Registered Students

üë®‚Äçüè´

{dashboardData.totalLecturers}

Academic Staff

üìö

{dashboardData.totalCourses}

Courses

{/* Faculty Statistics */}

Faculty Performance

{dashboardData.facultyStats.map((faculty, index) => (

{faculty.faculty}

{faculty.reports} Reports
{faculty.students} Students
))}
{/* Recent Activities */}

Recent Activities

{dashboardData.recentActivities.map((activity, index) => (
{activity.type === 'report' ? 'üìù' : 'üí¨'}

{activity.description}

{activity.time}
))}
{/* Popular Courses */}

Most Active Courses

{dashboardData.popularCourses.map((course, index) => (

{course.name}

{course.code}

{course.reports} reports
))}
{/* System Information */}

About the System

üìã Reporting

Lecturers submit detailed reports of each lecture session

‚úÖ Verification

Student representatives verify and sign completed reports

Monitoring

Principal lecturers monitor and approve teaching activities

Feedback

Comprehensive feedback system for continuous improvement

); }; export default PublicDashboard;
